activities.title: Breakfast at Konbini
activities.desc: Grab Onigiri & Coffee at 7-Eleven. Start your day like a local.

activities.title: Meiji Jingu Shrine
activities.desc: Access: Harajuku Station. Walk through the forest to the main shrine.

activities.title: Takeshita Street
activities.desc: Walk from Meiji Jingu. Try the famous Crepes and check out fashion shops.

activities.title: Lunch in Omotesando
activities.desc: Walk down Omotesando Hills. Recommended: Tonkatsu Maisen.

activities.title: Shibuya Crossing
activities.desc: Take Ginza Line to Shibuya. Photo at Hachiko Statue & Crossing.

activities.title: Shibuya Sky
activities.desc: Pre-book tickets! Best sunset view of Tokyo.

activities.title: Dinner in Shinjuku
activities.desc: Take Yamanote Line to Shinjuku. Omoide Yokocho for Yakitori.

activities.title: Kabukicho Stroll
activities.desc: See the neon lights and Godzilla head. Safe to walk, but ignore touters.

activities.title: Senso-ji Temple
activities.desc: Access: Asakusa Station. Go early to avoid crowds. Kaminarimon Gate photo.

activities.title: Nakamise Street
activities.desc: Snack on Melon Pan and Agemanju.

activities.title: Tokyo Skytree
activities.desc: Walk across Sumida River or take Tobu line. Shopping at Solamachi.

activities.title: Lunch: Sushi
activities.desc: Kura Sushi or Sushiro (Conveyor belt) in Solamachi.

activities.title: Akihabara
activities.desc: Take Tsukuba Express. Explore Animate, Radio Kaikan, and GiGO arcades.

activities.title: Maid Cafe Experience
activities.desc: Try @Home Cafe or just explore the electric town vibes.

activities.title: Dinner: Ramen
activities.desc: Kyushu Jangara Ramen Akihabara is famous.

activities.title: Ueno Park
activities.desc: Access: Ueno Station. Visit Tokyo National Museum or Ueno Zoo (Pandas).

activities.title: Ameyoko Street
activities.desc: Street food market. Fruit sticks, kebabs, and discount shopping.

activities.title: Ginza Shopping
activities.desc: Take Ginza Line. Visit Uniqlo Flagship (12 floors) and Dover Street Market.

activities.title: TeamLab Planets
activities.desc: Access: Toyosu Station. Immersive digital art museum (Pre-book!).

activities.title: Dinner in Tsukiji
activities.desc: Sushi Zanmai stays open late. Fresh seafood.

activities.title: Depart Early
activities.desc: Train to Maihama Station. Transfer to Disney Resort Line.

activities.title: DisneySea Entry
activities.desc: Head straight to Soaring or Journey to the Center of the Earth.

activities.title: Lunch: Gyoza Dog
activities.desc: Snack on themed popcorn and Gyoza sausage bun.

activities.title: Harbor Show
activities.desc: Watch the water show at Mediterranean Harbor.

activities.title: Dinner: Vulcania
activities.desc: Chinese food inside Mysterious Island.

activities.title: Fireworks
activities.desc: Enjoy 'Believe! Sea of Dreams' night show.

activities.title: Return to Hotel
activities.desc: Expect crowded trains on the way back.

activities.title: Checkout & Lockers
activities.desc: Leave bags at hotel or station lockers.

activities.title: Don Quijote
activities.desc: Last minute souvenir shopping (KitKats, skincare) at Donki.

activities.title: Last Lunch
activities.desc: Ichiran Ramen or CoCo Ichibanya Curry.

activities.title: Head to Airport
activities.desc: Take Keisei Skyliner (to Narita) or Monorail (to Haneda).

activities.title: Airport Shopping
activities.desc: Buy Tokyo Banana and Royce Chocolate at Duty Free.

activities.title: Flight Home
activities.desc: Have a safe flight back to Indonesia!
